EmailTemplate.description: This is the email that will go out when the "Talk to us" form is submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Talk to us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Steve Arhancet, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day.
If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
I look forward to speaking with you!
Best regards,
Steve Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment MBO Partners 703-793-6011 SArhancet@mbopartners.com
